item.description:
It looks like a medieval fortress, but a step inside the stone castle reveals the built-in couches, table trackway, and woodcarvings that all point to the creative genius that was William Gillette.

Let's meet and tour the castle, walk the grounds and have a picnic lunch! Admission to tour the castle is $5, walking the grounds and parking are free.

There are some great picnic spots so let's do a pot-luck picnic. Bring your favorite picnic dish to share. Post what your are bringing so we don't get too many duplicates. Everyone bring your own prefered beverage.

Click here for more info about the castle and for directions.
item.name: Gillette's Castle & Picnic Lunch
